Met with the amazing @Christopher Alarcon today at the Center for Career and Professional Advancement and he gave me some great post-grad advice:

Stop looking for a career that you fit into, and start looking for one that FITS YOU! Start a career based on characteristics you've always had instead of trying to force yourself to fit into one that isn't you!
New. Important. Relevant. Emotional. Your story must have one of these in order to grab someone's attention. #storytelling

Excited to be a part of EXPLORE Day! We have students from over 29 different colleges and universities learning about Vanguard. Shout out to Karen Fox, Julia Murphy, Kathryn Peck and Elizabeth Logue for facilitating a great kickoff!
Connecting extraordinary college students and graduates with dynamic career opportunities at Vanguard.

•	Collaborate with internal clients and vendors to structure exceptional training courses in alignment with company objectives.•	Consult with Vendor representatives regularly to ensure great working relationships are maintained through evaluation of deliverables including quality of facilitation, participant satisfaction, pricing and modes of training delivery.•	Partner with teams and build relationships to share information and coordinate on new ideas at the weekly meetings.•	Completed ample special projects.

•	Collaborated with numerous managers in multiple departments’ companywide to evaluate department training needs.•	Implemented training programs and provided course credit to participants.•	Coordinated timely delivery, and printing of all training courses’ materials.

•	Provided client focused exceptional customer service by implementing Vanguard’s long term investing strategies into diverse client conversations in order for clients to meet their investment goals.•	Exceeded department metric goals in every area, while sharing Vanguard mutual funds knowledge with co-workers.•	Adapted to a fast paced environment and quickly learned new technology systems and company policies.

•	One of four supervisors on a high-volume call center floor providing assistance and direction to 40-60 call center representatives during telephone interactions.  •	Received escalated calls and defused tense client interactions to the gratification of the customer and the company.•	During my tenure at ACS I transitioned from Customer Service Representative to Customer Service Supervisor to Trainer
United Way of Greater Philadelphia and Southern New Jersey

United Way Loaned Executives serve for approximately 4 months in the local United Way's fund-raising efforts. are very involved in fund-raising activities. The role involves a significant amount of local travel, spending the majority of time visiting local companies and meeting with CEOs, executives, and corporate teams involved in fund-raising. Other responsibilities include analyzing companies' donation histories and data to tailor a strategy to generate or enhance donations.

summary: Vanguard is one of the world's largest investment management companies and a recognized employer of choice. Vanguard's mission is to help clients reach their financial goals by being the world's highest-value provider of investment products and services. Explore Rewarding Careers with Vanguard, whether you're fresh out of college or ready for a career change, we have plenty of opportunities to explore.
